rows.label: tlk70000004_02_msg0001
rows.name:
This is ancestral Iiran land!
It's normal for it to be attacked?
I don't think so!

rows.label: tlk70000004_02_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah... But maybe that's the problem...
This enemy isn't normal, so that's why
this has happened.

rows.label: tlk70000004_02_msg0003
rows.name:
If you close your eyes to the fires of
war and rebellion happening on the
opposite shore, this is what happens.

rows.label: tlk70000004_02_msg0004
rows.name:
I'll talk to Morumo. We'll have to call
the Chamber's emergency committee.
Can't let it happen twice, no sirree!

rows.label: tlk70000004_02_msg0005
rows.name:
...Teeco will have to be brave too
from now on...
